column1: Smoque BBQ////We had lunch on a Tuesday
column2: so there was no line and service was quick! Ordered chopped brisket and pulled pork
column3: and I must say - best BBQ joint in Chicago!! Absolutely gorgeous meat that falls apart at the fork I almost cried T T. pork was exceptionally great
column4: but I just prefer brisket for my taste. Mac and cheese was creamy
column6: and peach cobbler is a must buy for a side. The only side that was average was the chili
column7: but even then it was ok. Will definitely go again!!
